Name: Tank Hero VR
About the game: According to the suggestion from the players, we release the updated version and the new updated version has more levels for players to choose including urban warfare, base attack, and also desert battle. Players need to choose the battle first and then control the tank and complete the different missions. It's really the excellent Tank VR experience:)
